commit.message: Moved the transactions history header inside the list in order to allow scrolling the app header when pulling history header

Changed the way of filtering transactions in history.
Replaced Loader with LiveData
Fixed crash on Android 4.4 when registering identity

Merge branch 'evonet-develop' into home-screen-scrolling

# Conflicts:
#	wallet/src/de/schildbach/wallet/ui/TransactionsAdapter.java
#	wallet/src/de/schildbach/wallet/ui/WalletTransactionsFragment.java

Fixed bugs and implemented missing stuff

nodes.bodyText: Clicking "view all requests" on the Contacts screen results in a "Contact Request" screen with no entries even when there are contact requests are visible on the Contacts Screen.  Not sure if this is related to this code.
